title: Arbiter
mainLanguage: Use English as the main language.

label.name: Name your Project *
label.noProjects: There are currently no projects. You can create a new project by clicking the button at the bottom of the page.
label.selectProject: Select a project to begin working
label.selectAOI: Pinch and Drag the map to show the area that you want to work in.

alert.serverInUse: This server is in use by one or more projects.
alert.locationNotAvailable: Location not available... Please check that Location Services are on for Arbiter.
alert.mediaFailed: Vector data synchronized, but failed to send {0} media item(s).  Check connection and try again.
alert.mediaNotFound: Unable to transfer '{0}': File not found locally.
alert.mediaFileSystem: Unable to transfer '{0}': Could not acquire file system.
alert.noCamera: Unable to use the camera for this device.
alert.noLibrary: Unable to access the photo library on this device.
alert.unableToCopy: Unable to copy media to the project directory.
alert.onlyAvailableOnline: This functionality is only available when the device has network connectivity indicated by a green sync button on the lower left corner of the map
alert.serverNotResponding:
Could not connect
Server not responding
alert.checkURL:
Could not connect
Ensure URL was entered correctly and server is online
alert.performFullSync: Please perform a full sync by pressing and holding the sync botton to pull down the new tiles.
